summary: Attempted to run TestSprite tests. Installed Playwright and Chromium browser. Updated test_001_Login_Flow_Test.py to use port 19006 instead of 8081. Test execution failed with connection refused error, indicating the frontend web server may not be running on port 19006. Need to start the frontend web server (npm run web) before running tests.
current_status: TestSprite tests are configured but cannot run until frontend web server is started on port 19006. Playwright is installed and ready. Test files are updated to use correct port.
